refnamediv.refpurpose: Instantiates and runs a compiled Faust program.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Faustaudio will instantiate and run a Faust program compiled with faustcompile.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifac -- a handle to a compiled Faust program, produced by faustcompile.
ihandle -- a handle to the Faust DSP instance, which can be used to access its controls with faustctl.
